verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and <S%H5265>took<s%> our <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me: and we <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
You have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H7227>long<s%> enough: <S%H6437>turn<s%> you <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

And <S%H6680>command<s%> you the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You are to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of you: take you <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves therefore:

<S%H1624>Meddle<s%> not with them; for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you of their <S%H776>land,<s%> no, not so <S%H5704>much<s%> as a <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4096>breadth;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

You shall <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and you shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3739>buy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that you may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> he <S%H3045>knows<s%> your <S%H3212>walking<s%> through <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has been with you; you have <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H3808>nothing.<s%>

And when we <S%H5674>passed<s%> by from our <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H359>Elath,<s%> and from <S%H6100>Eziongaber,<s%> we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6696>Distress<s%> not the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1624>contend<s%> with them in <S%H4421>battle:<s%> for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you of their <S%H776>land<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>
The <S%H368>Emims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein in times past, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H7227>many,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%>
<S%H1992>Which<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> were <S%H2803>accounted<s%> <S%H7497>giants,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%> but the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> them <S%H368>Emims.<s%>

The <S%H2752>Horims<s%> also <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime;<s%> but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, when they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead;<s%> as <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up, said I, and <S%H5674>get<s%> you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%> And we <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>space<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H1980>came<s%> from <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we were <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered,<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>wasted<s%> out from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them.

For <S%H1571>indeed<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was against them, to <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed<s%> and <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
You are to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> through <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> this <S%H3117>day:<s%>

And when you <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H6696>distress<s%> them not, <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H1624>meddle<s%> with them: for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> any <S%H3425>possession;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

(That <S%H637>also<s%> was <S%H2803>accounted<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>giants:<s%> <S%H7497>giants<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein in <S%H6440>old<s%> time; and the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H2157>Zamzummims;<s%>

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H7227>many,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakims;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead:<s%>

As he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2752>Horims<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%>

And the <S%H5757>Avims<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H2699>Hazerim,<s%> even to <S%H5804>Azzah,<s%> the <S%H3732>Caphtorims,<s%> which <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3731>Caphtor,<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead.<s%>)

<S%H6965>Rise<s%> you up, take your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon:<s%> <S%H7200>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and his <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H1624>contend<s%> with him in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of you and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of you on the <S%H5971>nations<s%> that are <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8088>report<s%> of you, and shall <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and be in <S%H2342>anguish<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of you.

And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land:<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> along by the <S%H1870>high<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> I will <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

You shall <S%H7666>sell<s%> me <S%H400>meat<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that I may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H7272>feet;<s%>

(As the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to me;) <S%H5704>until<s%> I shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> us.

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> by him: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7185>hardened<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and made his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H553>obstinate,<s%> that he might <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as appears <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess,<s%> that you may <S%H3423>inherit<s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>
Then <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> us, he and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%> at <S%H3096>Jahaz.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> us; and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H4962>men,<s%> and the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> we <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> to <S%H8300>remain:<s%>
<S%H7535>Only<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to ourselves, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H3920>took.<s%>

From <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and from the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is by the <S%H5158>river,<s%> even to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> there was not one <S%H7151>city<s%> too <S%H7682>strong<s%> for us: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> to us:

<S%H7535>Only<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> you <S%H7126>came<s%> not, nor to <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3027>place<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> nor to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> nor to <S%H3605>whatever<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>forbade<s%> us.
